page.title: 07ALLEN CLARK RESEARCH CENTRE
page.content: The centre is owned by the Plessey Company to develop Telecommunications and Defence Electronic Systems.Known locally as Caswell because it was in the 1940's that the centre opened at Caswell House.Out of 700 employees 245 are graduates with high qualifications.These have a support staff of 107 technicians.There are also 53 trainees at the centre.The majority of these employees are between the ages of 30 to 40 years.Recent building expansion includes a new building for Silicon integrated circuitry research.This is shaped like a silicon chip,with lighting in the entrance hall based on a molecular structure.Approx.80% of staff live within a radius of 15 miles of Caswell and most are transported by coach every day.
